name: The Great Bebra
description:
THE GREAT BEBRA. 

 What, bebra jokes? It was so long ago! Why does it exist?  

Everything is not as simple as it seems at first glance! Where people want to get it, let it be endless happiness and joy in their lives. But it was not there!  

The damned and bloody organization Super Secret Agents (SSA) is trying with all its might to prevent ABSOLUTELY all people from reaching this legendary artifact!  

Ordinary dudes and gamers, Daniil (Kosmo) and Ivan (Lazurit) finally got together to give bream to all those who applied to the SSA organization and get The Great Bebra to give it away and keep it with trusted persons.
